title: Bamboo Lounge - Forest Retreat
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Laotian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little place offering pasta and oven baked pizza, along with breakfast, soups, and salad. Relaxed atmosphere with couches upstairs. Has Wi-Fi, creature comforts. Vegetarian items are labelled and understood by staff. Makes bread and you could get vegan pizza. Frequented by tourists.
streetAddress: Green building, Phonxay Village, Main Street / Highway 17A/3A
